question: [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetLatestVotingResult()] [Dependency on AssertVotingItem] If AssertVotingItem() throws an assertion for non-existent voting items, can this be exploited for DoS by repeatedly querying invalid IDs? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetLatestVotingResult()] [Null Return] If State.VotingResults[votingResultHash] returns null for the current snapshot, does the method return null without validation, potentially causing issues in consuming code? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetLatestVotingResult()] [Race Condition] Can this method return stale data if CurrentSnapshotNumber is incremented by TakeSnapshot() immediately after line 46 but before line 52? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetLatestVotingResult()] [Information Disclosure] Can an attacker continuously poll this method to monitor real-time voting progress and influence late voters? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetLatestVotingResult()] [Input Validation] Does the method validate the input Hash before passing to AssertVotingItem, potentially causing null reference issues? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetLatestVotingResult()] [Data Integrity] If votingItem.CurrentSnapshotNumber has been corrupted or manipulated, can this return results for an incorrect snapshot? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetLatestVotingResult()] [Timing Attack] Can repeatedly querying latest results at high frequency be used to infer when votes are being cast or withdrawn? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetLatestVotingResult()] [DoS] Can an attacker flood queries for the latest results of hundreds of voting items to overload node resources? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetLatestVotingResult()] [Hash Computation] Is there risk that computing VotingResult.GetHash() on line 51 could produce collisions leading to wrong data retrieval? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetLatestVotingResult()] [State Consistency] If CurrentSnapshotNumber is 0 or invalid, can this cause retrieval of non-existent or corrupted voting results? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetVotingIds()] [Null Reference] If State.VotedItemsMap[input.Voter] returns null, will accessing .VotedItemVoteIds throw NullReferenceException on line 57? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetVotingIds()] [Collection Exception] If the Where clause on line 57 returns no matching entries, will First() throw InvalidOperationException causing transaction failure? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetVotingIds()] [Key Not Found] If input.VotingItemId.ToHex() does not exist in VotedItemVoteIds dictionary, will the Where/Select/First chain fail? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetVotingIds()] [Input Validation] Does the method validate that input, input.Voter, or input.VotingItemId are not null before processing? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetVotingIds()] [DoS] Can an attacker repeatedly query non-existent voter/voting item combinations to cause exceptions and resource consumption? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetVotingIds()] [Information Disclosure] Can this method be used to determine which voting items a specific voter has participated in by testing all possible voting item IDs? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetVotingIds()] [Privacy Violation] Does returning all vote IDs (both active and withdrawn) for a voter/item pair expose complete voting history without authorization? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetVotingIds()] [Logic Error] If VotedItemVoteIds contains multiple entries with the same key (should be impossible but if corrupted), will First() return non-deterministic results? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetVotingIds()] [Data Exposure] Can the returned VotedIds containing vote ID hashes be used to query individual voting records and reconstruct complete voting patterns? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Function: GetVotingIds()] [State Timing] If a voter's VotedItems is being updated during this query, can the Where/Select/First chain access inconsistent data? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Multiple Functions] [State Consistency] Can any view method return inconsistent data if called during execution of Vote(), Withdraw(), or TakeSnapshot() on the same voting item? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Multiple Functions] [Access Control] Do all view methods lack access control, allowing any caller to query sensitive voting data including voter identities, amounts, and choices? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Multiple Functions] [DoS Vector] Can an attacker orchestrate coordinated queries across all view methods simultaneously to overload node state access? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Multiple Functions] [Data Correlation] Can combining results from multiple view methods enable deanonymization of voters or reconstruction of private voting strategies? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [Multiple Functions] [State Caching] If node implementations cache view method results, can stale data be served after state-modifying operations complete? (Low)
